verses.name: Acts 11:8
verses.text: But I said, Not so, Lord: for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth.

verses.name: Acts 11:9
verses.text: But the voice answered me again from heaven, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.

verses.name: Acts 11:10
verses.text: And this was done three times: and all were drawn up again into heaven.

verses.name: Acts 11:11
verses.text: And, behold, immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was, sent from Cesarea unto me.

verses.name: Acts 11:12
verses.text: And the spirit bade me go with them, nothing doubting. Moreover these six brethren accompanied me, and we entered into the man’s house:
